message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at an introductory price of $7500. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope we can discuss further to ensure you benefit from this exceptional value.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $7500 is a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $6500?

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. In light of your budget constraints, I am willing to adjust the price to $6800. This still reflects the high value and quality of the product, while making it more accessible to you. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and we can move forward with the transaction.
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $6200?

I understand your concerns, Bob. In order to accommodate your budget, I am prepared to offer the product at $6550. This price still reflects the value and quality of the product, while being more within your financial limits. I hope this revised offer will be acceptable to you and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $6000?

Considering your latest proposal, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose to offer the product at $6300. This price still ensures that you receive a product of high quality and value, while being more aligned with your budgetary considerations. I hope this revised offer will meet your requirements and facilitate a successful transaction.
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still not convinced that the price is right. Would you be willing to consider a price of $5800?

I appreciate your persistence in finding a price that suits your needs, Bob. To accommodate your request, I am now offering the product at $6050. This price still maintains the value and quality of the product, while being more in line with your budget. I hope this revised offer will be satisfactory and allow us to proceed with the transaction.
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $6000, but no higher. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
